#id=1
#text=For me there is nothing more relaxing then taking a nice hot bath after a long day of work .
#id=2
#text=When I got home the first thing I did was start the running water in the tub .
#id=3
#text=I made sure the temperature was perfect before putting the drain stopper in place .
#id=4
#text=I then went to my room and got some clean clothes and a towel from the closet .
#id=5
#text=I like to listen to music when I take a bath so I brought along my i-pod and small speakers .
#id=6
#text=When the tub was almost filled I stop the water , turned the music on , and stepped inside the tub .
#id=7
#text=It was like a little piece of heaven as the warm water washed over my body .
#id=8
#text=After about 10 minutes of relaxing I found the soap and started to apply it all over my body .
#id=9
#text=When I was finished I pulled the drain stopper and started to rinse the soap off .
#text=After all the water was drained I grabbed my towel and started to dry off , then I finally slipped into my clean clothes .
#text=It was so relaxing , I just ca n't wait to do it again very soon .
